# The `SCEVRewriteVisitor` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This visitor recursively visits a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expression and re-writes it. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename SC&gt;
class llvm::SCEVRewriteVisitor&lt;SC&gt;</CodeBlock>

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/scevvisitor">SCEVVisitor&lt;SC, RetVal&gt;</a></>}>
This class defines a simple visitor class that may be used for various <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> analysis purposes. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/scevvisitor/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Description {#details}

This visitor recursively visits a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expression and re-writes it.

The result from each visit is cached, so it will return the same <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> for the same input.

Definition at line 747 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolutionexpressions-h">ScalarEvolutionExpressions.h</a>.
